alert.note: Alert for Isanti; Mille Lacs (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 3:36PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Mille Lacs, western Isanti and northeastern Sherburne Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 336 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Foreston, or 23 miles northwest of Cambridge, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Princeton around 350 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Cambridge. This includes U.S. Highway 169 between mile markers 175 and 192. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
